description: sheer white fabric woven with plaid design; embroidered overall with isolated red squares; PL side has border with squares and large organic motif near LR corner with solid red embroidery at corner and bottom; black embroidery around solid red section; fringe at bottom with row of red squares above. title: Curtain panel
